input: What is this organization all about ?
What is the work you do ?
Tell me more about the organisation ?
responses: Bangalore Food Bank is all about feeding those who cannot feed themselves
We are here to help in eradicating hunger from our society. You would be donating for a good cause.
We feed the children in shelter homes and schools. We colab with our ground level partners to identify the most needy.

input: How much have you achieved so far ?
responses: We have supported more than 30 NGO's dedicated to the cause
We have donated 519 million tonnes of food to the needy. You'll be helping those who actually need it
Despite our young existence, we have donated over 519 million tonnes of food to the needy
We support 30 NGO's and schools. We act as first responders whenever there is a need for distribution of food during any crisis.
